message: Hi Bob, I propose we settle now with a split that takes into account our different devaluation rates. You would get $40 and I would get $60. Accepting this offer now spares you from further loss of value in later rounds. Looking forward to a fair and swift agreement!

Hi Alice, considering the rapid devaluation for both of us, I propose a 50-50 split this round. This is fair and ensures we both get a reasonable amount before the value drops further. Let's agree on this and end the game now.
